entry.title: siddharthtiwari-03/UnSQL: UnSQL is an open-source, lightweight JavaScript library that provides schema-less, class based, clean and modern interface to interact with structured Database (MySQL), through dynamic query generation. UnSQL is compatible with JavaScript based runtimes like Node.js and Next.js
entry.content: UnSQL is an open-source, lightweight JavaScript library that provides schema-less, class based, clean and modern interface to interact with structured Database (MySQL), through dynamic query generation. UnSQL is compatible with JavaScript based runtimes like Node.js and Next.js
